languages.text: "Моя династия нуждается в исцелении. Мне предстоит отыскать колонии, пути к которым разметал варп-шторм. Искоренить мерзость, расплодившуюся при дворе Каллигоса, оказать помощь мирам, которые он обескровил. Дать отпор терзающим протекторат ксеносам, вычистить лазутчиков Последнего восхода, заключить мир с династией Чорда и вернуть отнятые у нас планеты... Не знаю, хватит ли у меня сил на все это. Но я не отступлю".

"My dynasty needs healing. It falls to me to discover new paths to the colonies isolated by the warp storm. To weed out the villainy that has infected Calligos's court. To help the worlds he has bled dry. To stand up to the xenos who terrorise the protectorate. To wipe out the Final Dawn infiltrators. To make peace with House Chorda and reclaim the planets taken from us... I don't know if I have the strength to do all of that. But I will not back down."
languages.original_text: "Моя династия нуждается в исцелении. Мне предстоит отыскать колонии, пути к которым разметал варп-шторм. Искоренить мерзость, расплодившуюся при дворе Каллигоса, оказать помощь мирам, которые он обескровил. Дать отпор терзающим протекторат ксеносам, вычистить лазутчиков Последнего восхода, заключить мир с династией Чорда и вернуть отнятые у нас планеты... Не знаю, хватит ли у меня сил на все это. Но я не отступлю".

traits.locale_text: "My dynasty needs healing. It falls to me to find the colonies that have had the paths to them obliterated by the warp storm. To weed out the villany that has spread through Calligos's court. To help the worlds he has bled dry. To stand up to the xenos who terrorise the protectorate. To clean up the Final Dawn infiltrators. To make peace with House Chorda and reclaim the planets taken from us... I don't know if I have the strength to do all that. But I will not back down."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: «Mi dinastía necesita recuperarse. Sobre mí recae la responsabilidad de hallar nuevas rutas hasta las colonias que han quedado aisladas por la tormenta de disformidad. Erradicar la maldad que ha infectado la corte de Calligos. Ayudar a los mundos que ha expoliado. Presentar batalla a los xenos que aterrorizan el protectorado. Eliminar a los agentes infiltrados del Amanecer Final. Firmar la paz con la casa Chorda y reclamar los planetas que nos fueron arrebatados... No sé si poseo la fuerza necesaria para hacer todo eso. Pero no pienso amilanarme».
languages.original_text: "My dynasty needs healing. It falls to me to discover new paths to the colonies isolated by the warp storm. To weed out the villainy that has infected Calligos's court. To help the worlds he has bled dry. To stand up to the xenos who terrorise the protectorate. To wipe out the Final Dawn infiltrators. To make peace with House Chorda and reclaim the planets taken from us... I don't know if I have the strength to do all of that. But I will not back down."

traits.locale_text: «Mi dinastía necesita recuperarse. Sobre mí recae la responsabilidad de hallar nuevas rutas hasta las colonias que han quedado aisladas por la tormenta de disformidad. Erradicar la maldad que ha infectado la corte de Calligos. Ayudar a los mundos que ha expoliado. Presentar batalla a los xenos que aterrorizan el protectorado. Eliminar a los agentes infiltrados del Amanecer Final. Firmar la paz con la casa Chorda y reclamar los planetas que nos fueron arrebatados... No sé si poseo la fuerza necesaria para hacer todo eso. Pero no pienso amilanarme».
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: “我的王朝需要治愈。我有很多事情要做，我要找到被亚空间风暴隔绝的殖民地，开辟通往那里的新航道。我要清除被邪恶玷污的卡里戈斯朝廷，向那些被他榨干的世界伸出援手。我要对抗威胁王朝的异形，消灭终末黎明的渗透者，与库尔达家族议和，夺回曾属于我们的行星……我不知道我能不能完成这些目标，但我绝不会轻易放弃。”
languages.original_text: "My dynasty needs healing. It falls to me to discover new paths to the colonies isolated by the warp storm. To weed out the villainy that has infected Calligos's court. To help the worlds he has bled dry. To stand up to the xenos who terrorise the protectorate. To wipe out the Final Dawn infiltrators. To make peace with House Chorda and reclaim the planets taken from us... I don't know if I have the strength to do all of that. But I will not back down."

traits.locale_text: “我的王朝需要治愈。我有很多事情要做，我要找到被亚空间风暴隔绝的殖民地，开辟通往那里的新航道。我要清除被邪恶玷污的卡里戈斯朝廷，向那些被他榨干的世界伸出援手。我要对抗威胁王朝的异形，消灭终末黎明的渗透者，与库尔达家族议和，夺回曾属于我们的行星……我不知道我能不能完成这些目标，但我绝不会轻易放弃。”
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: « Ma dynastie a besoin de se remettre. C'est donc à moi qu'il incombe de découvrir de nouvelles routes menant aux colonies isolées par la tempête Warp, d'éradiquer la corruption qui a infecté la cour de Calligos, d'aider les mondes saignés à blanc, de résister aux xénos qui sèment la terreur dans le protectorat, d'éliminer les agents infiltrés de l'Aube finale, de faire la paix avec la maison Chorda et de reprendre les planètes qui nous ont été volées... J'ignore si j'aurai la force d'accomplir tous ces objectifs, mais je ne reculerai pas. »
languages.original_text: "My dynasty needs healing. It falls to me to discover new paths to the colonies isolated by the warp storm. To weed out the villainy that has infected Calligos's court. To help the worlds he has bled dry. To stand up to the xenos who terrorise the protectorate. To wipe out the Final Dawn infiltrators. To make peace with House Chorda and reclaim the planets taken from us... I don't know if I have the strength to do all of that. But I will not back down."

traits.locale_text: « Ma dynastie a besoin de se remettre. C'est donc à moi qu'il incombe de découvrir de nouvelles routes menant aux colonies isolées par la tempête Warp, d'éradiquer la corruption qui a infecté la cour de Calligos, d'aider les mondes saignés à blanc, de résister aux xénos qui sèment la terreur dans le protectorat, d'éliminer les agents infiltrés de l'Aube finale, de faire la paix avec la maison Chorda et de reprendre les planètes qui nous ont été volées... J'ignore si j'aurai la force d'accomplir tous ces objectifs, mais je ne reculerai pas. »
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: 「私の王朝には癒しが必要だ。〈歪み〉の嵐で孤立したコロニーへの新しい道を発見するのは私の役目だ。カリゴスの宮廷に巣食う悪党を一掃すること。カリゴスが疲弊させた世界を救うこと。保護領を脅かすゼノに立ち向かうこと。最後の夜明けの侵入者を一掃すること。チョーダ家と和解し、奪われた惑星を取り戻すこと…そのすべてを成し遂げる力が私にあるかどうかはわからない。しかし、私は諦めたりはしない」
languages.original_text: "My dynasty needs healing. It falls to me to discover new paths to the colonies isolated by the warp storm. To weed out the villainy that has infected Calligos's court. To help the worlds he has bled dry. To stand up to the xenos who terrorise the protectorate. To wipe out the Final Dawn infiltrators. To make peace with House Chorda and reclaim the planets taken from us... I don't know if I have the strength to do all of that. But I will not back down."

traits.locale_text: 「私の王朝には癒しが必要だ。〈歪み〉の嵐で孤立したコロニーへの新しい道を発見するのは私の役目だ。カリゴスの宮廷に巣食う悪党を一掃すること。カリゴスが疲弊させた世界を救うこと。保護領を脅かすゼノに立ち向かうこと。最後の夜明けの侵入者を一掃すること。チョーダ家と和解し、奪われた惑星を取り戻すこと…そのすべてを成し遂げる力が私にあるかどうかはわからない。しかし、私は諦めたりはしない」
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: "Meine Dynastie braucht Heilung. Es fällt mir zu, neue Pfade zu den Kolonien zu entdecken, die durch den Warpsturm isoliert wurden. Die Schurkerei auszurotten, die Calligos' Hof infiziert hat. Den Welten zu helfen, die er ausgeblutet hat. Die Xenos zu bekämpfen, die das Protektorat terrorisieren. Die Infiltratoren der Letzten Dämmerung auszulöschen. Frieden mit Haus Chorda zu schließen und die Planeten zurückzuerobern, die uns geraubt wurden ... Ich weiß nicht, ob ich die Kraft habe, all das zu tun. Aber ich werde nicht aufgeben."
languages.original_text: "My dynasty needs healing. It falls to me to discover new paths to the colonies isolated by the warp storm. To weed out the villainy that has infected Calligos's court. To help the worlds he has bled dry. To stand up to the xenos who terrorise the protectorate. To wipe out the Final Dawn infiltrators. To make peace with House Chorda and reclaim the planets taken from us... I don't know if I have the strength to do all of that. But I will not back down."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Dynastie braucht Heilung. Es fällt mir zu, neue Pfade zu den Kolonien zu entdecken, die durch den Warpsturm isoliert wurden. Die Schurkerei auszurotten, die Calligos' Hof infiziert hat. Den Welten zu helfen, die er ausgeblutet hat. Die Xenos zu bekämpfen, die das Protektorat terrorisieren. Die Infiltratoren der Letzten Dämmerung auszulöschen. Frieden mit Haus Chorda zu schließen und die Planeten zurückzuerobern, die uns geraubt wurden ... Ich weiß nicht, ob ich die Kraft habe, all das zu tun. Aber ich werde nicht aufgeben."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: "Hanedanlığımın iyileşmeye ihtiyacı var. Öteboyut fırtınası yüzünden her yerle bağlantısı kopan kolonilere giden yeni yollar bulmak, Calligos'un sarayını ele geçiren kötülüğü temizlemek, mahvolup gitmiş dünyalara yardım etmek, protektorada terör rüzgârları estiren zenolara karşı mücadele vermek, Nihai Şafak casuslarını yok etmek, Chorda Hanesi'yle barışı sağlamak ve bizden alınan gezegenleri geri almak... Bunların hepsi vazifem. Hepsini yerine getirebilecek kadar güçlü müyüm, orasını bilmiyorum. Fakat pes etmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "My dynasty needs healing. It falls to me to discover new paths to the colonies isolated by the warp storm. To weed out the villainy that has infected Calligos's court. To help the worlds he has bled dry. To stand up to the xenos who terrorise the protectorate. To wipe out the Final Dawn infiltrators. To make peace with House Chorda and reclaim the planets taken from us... I don't know if I have the strength to do all of that. But I will not back down."

traits.locale_text: "Hanedanlığımın iyileşmeye ihtiyacı var. Öteboyut fırtınası yüzünden tek başına kalmış kolonilere giden yeni yollar bulmak, Calligos'un mahkemesini ele geçiren kötülüğü temizlemek, kanını son damlasına kadar döken dünyalara yardım etmek, protektorada terör rüzgârları estiren zenoların karşısına dikilmek, Nihai Şafak casuslarını yok etmek, Chorda Hanesi'yle barışı sağlamak ve bizden alınan gezegenleri geri almak... Bunları tümü benim görevim. Tümünü yapabilecek kadar güçlü müyüm, bilmiyorum. Fakat pes etmeyeceğim."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final
